channel.title: Posts on Trivia Stats

item.title: Trivia Statistics 2020-09-18
item.description: Viewing Creator Plots First, load the trivia_stats.R source file, which contains all functions for generating statistics: source("trivia_stats.R") Then run generate_creator_plot(CREATOR_NAME): generate_creator_plot("Alex") generate_creator_plot("Chris")
